name: The Cavern of Madness
description:
Treasure Bot 48 had a mission... gather the gems. And this is what it did. Until the day TB 48 discovered  a new cave, and even though it already completed it's primary task - it decided to go DEEPER . Was there possibly more it could do? Could it gather more gems? Could it make the world safer for those it served by defeating that which lived within? 

Will it survive?  Come along and see.

Controls:

Arrow Keys or WASD to move.

Press the space bar to jump, Hold the space bar to jump higher.

My hope is that  you have fun playing our game. That is the mission.
